Describe what changed and why.

## Security Impact

Select all that apply:

- [ ] Authorization or permission logic changed
- [ ] API key or secret handling changed
- [ ] Dependency or workflow versions changed
- [ ] No security-impacting changes

## Security Checklist

- [ ] Cross-tenant and cross-role negative cases were considered
- [ ] No client-side API key exposure introduced
- [ ] Least-privilege scope remains intact
- [ ] CI security jobs passed
- [ ] Any accepted risk has owner and expiry

## Evidence

Link logs, test results, or screenshots for security claims.
